result.title: Toolbox of methodologies and tools to set and run a living lab
result.description: Toolbox gathering tools and engagement methodologies to a) gather a group of relevant stakeholders, b) run the LL and interact with stakeholders & with the other WPs, c) guarantee stakeholder engagement, d) test the tools and co-design new ones. This toolbox will include canvas for stakeholder consultation, interactive tools and guidelines for stakeholder engagement.
